FuncDef: This command configures the Service Ingress QoS policy scope as exclusive or template.

ParaDef.Info: When the scope of a policy is defined as exclusive, the policy can only be applied to one SAP. If a policy with an exclusive scope is assigned to a second SAP, an error message is generated. If the policy is removed from the exclusive SAP, it will become available for assignment to another exclusive SAP.
When the scope of a policy is defined as template, the policy can be applied to multiple SAPs on the router.
